text: The yellowtail rasbora (Rasbora tornieri) is a large species of rasbora found in mainland Southeast Asia. == In aquariums == The yellowtail rasbora is used in aquariums. It is normally peaceful. == Related pages == * Mangar (fish) * Mindanao rasbora == References == # Froese, Rainer; Pauly, Daniel (eds.) (2006). "Rasbora tornieri" in FishBase. April 2006 version. Category:IUCN Red List least concern species Category:Cypriniformes Category:Ray-finned fish Category:Freshwater fish
title: Yellowtail rasbora
